Date maintenance tags and general fixes
/* Popular culture */ Voila! no more gallery
/* Politics */ Broke paragraph because discussion is missing 1968, '72, '76, 80, 84 and 1988 elections, 20 missing years deserves at least a para break
/* Politics */ Just deleted prose, undue and wrong; Truman'48 won by 75%, Carter'76 won by 71% see JVL ref. Prose not supported by refs, refs are OK
/* Politics */ Minor revert, read it again, Socialists garnered double the Democrats in 1920, see JVL ref
/* Politics */ Moved unsupported prose to more appropriate location with fact tag. McGovern, Carter 2, Mondale and Dukakis all fail this prose, see JVL ref
/* Politics */ being protest does not make you not jewish, but let's do this instead
small fixes; Goldwater's father became a protestant before Goldwater was born
/* Politics */ keeping Democratic era and (apparently) notable religious references in a more coherent manner
/* Politics */ 60% â 'nearly 70', drop from 90% is notable and still the best to date. Reagan got close, but not on re-election and he isn't noted in section
/* Politics */ Removed OR. Truman got only 75%, with 15% going to the Progressive's Wallace. Added both parties support for Jewish state in 44 and 48
/* Politics */ Added more info in general statement of voting, based on JVL ref
/* Politics */ paternal grandparents and therefore also his father
